item.title: First Krita Book in French!
item.description: After Japanese and English, here is the first book for french-speaking people who want to get started using Krita! The author is Timothée Giet, long time user and contributor and the creator of two of acclaimed training DVDs for the Krita Foundation, Comics with Krita and Secrets of Krita.

item.description: (This video has subtitles in english) Okay, so I’ve wanted to do a tutorial for transform masks for a while now, and this is sorta ending up to be a flower-drawing tutorial.

item.description: One of the 2014 Google Summer of Code projects for Krita is going to be in the next release, Krita 2.

item.title: How to select areas with the paintbrush in Krita 2.9
item.description: We have retired the Selection Brush in 2.9. There are several reasons for this: It was not a real brush, there was no pressure sensitivity, adding and removing from selections was complex.
